title: Rapaport Presents: How to Increase Diamond Demand A Special "Diamond Dream" Breakfast Seminar
text:
Tuesday, August 4, 2015 2:35PM IST (9:05AM GMT) Rapaport Presents: How to Increase Diamond Demand A Special "Diamond Dream" Breakfast Seminar Grand Hyatt, Mumbai, Friday, August 7, 8-11am Mumbai, Maharashtra, India 
Rapaport India is pleased to announce that Martin Rapaport will be hosting a special breakfast seminar entitled the “Diamond Dream.” The seminar will focus on what can be done to increase consumer demand for diamonds with particular attention to the Indian market. A panel of top diamond and jewelry trade leaders will convene for a wide-ranging discussion of the challenges and opportunities presented by recent developments in the diamond industry. Topics will include marketing and promotion, responsible sourcing, synthetic diamonds, bank financing and more. The panelists will include: Ashok Minawala, Board Member of the All India Gems and Jewellery Trade Federation C K Venkatrama, CEO of Tanishq Sanjay Kothari, PMBD convener Vipul Shah, Chairman of the Gem and Jewellery Export Promotion Council Martin Rapaport, Chairman of Rapaport Group, Moderator The breakfast seminar is an invitation-only event that will take place in the Grand Ballroom of the Grand Hyatt Hotel, Mumbai from 8:00 to 11:00 am on Friday, August 7. Breakfast will be served at 8:00 am and the seminar will begin at 9:00 am sharp. The Rapaport Group would like to thank the Gem and Jewellery Export Promotion Council for supporting the Rapaport breakfast seminar. Transportation will be organized from official IIJS hotels to the Grand Hyatt Hotel and then onward to the IIJS show venue. Members of the media or trade that would like to receive an invitation may contact %20conference@diamonds.net , but please note that spacing is limited. About the Rapaport Group: The Rapaport Group is an international network of companies providing added value services that support the development of fair, transparent, competitive and efficient diamond and jewelry markets. Established in 1978, the Rapaport Price List and Magazine is the primary source of diamond price and market information. Group activities include Rapaport Information Services and Diamonds.net, providing research, analysis and news; RapNet – the world's largest diamond trading network; Rapaport Laboratory Services provides GIA gemological services in India, Belgium and Israel; and Rapaport Trading and Auction Services specializing in recycled diamonds and jewelry. The Group supports over 20,000 clients in 118 countries and employs 220 people with offices in New York, Las Vegas, Antwerp, Ramat Gan, Mumbai, Surat, Dubai and Hong Kong.
